Package

allegro

Initializers

📄 🆕

Class 🖼

🖼 represents a bitmap.

Initializers

📄

🍬 🐈 📄 path 🔡

Creates a bitmap from the image at the given path.

🆕

🍬 🐈 🆕 width 🚂 height 🚂

Creates a bitmap with the given height and width.
